analysis.description:
IdiotTokenSale.setup (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#330-357) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(tokenCap == token.balanceOf(this))

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol:
	Contract IdiotToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#273)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in IdiotTokenSale.setup (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#330-357):
	External calls:
	- token.transferInitialAllocation(owner,22800000 * MULTIPLIER) (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#334-335)
	- token.transferInitialAllocationWithTimedLock(founder1,7600000 * MULTIPLIER,now + 31536000) (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#336-338)
	- token.transferInitialAllocationWithTimedLock(founder2,7600000 * MULTIPLIER,now + 31536000) (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#339-343)
	- token.transferInitialAllocation(angelPool,6840000 * MULTIPLIER) (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#348-349)
	- token.transferInitialAllocation(advisoryPool,760000 * MULTIPLIER) (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#349-350)
	- require(bool)(tokenCap == token.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#353-354)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- setupDone (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#354-355)

IdiotTokenSale.setup (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#330-357) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferInitialAllocation(owner,22800000 * MULTIPLIER) (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#334-335)

	-token.transferInitialAllocation(advisoryPool,760000 * MULTIPLIER) (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#349-350)

IdiotTokenSale.buyToken (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#357-371) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferInitialAllocation(msg.sender,purchasedToken) (/unique_chucks/34/0x3615bbd725776b4c9d9997d6a63cf7ad3eb4ec83.sol#363-366)

	State variables written after the call(s):
